mapper.insert: insert into t_acct_catype (catypeid, account_book_type, catypename, iscus) values (#{catypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountBookType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iscus,jdbcType=TINYINT})
